item.title: Milestone 1 - Test Cases
item.description: Milestone 1 - Test Cases Milestone 1: ABHA creation and capture & verification for seamless patient registration S.No. Purpose Serial API Description 1 Registration 1.0.1 v1/auth/cert Authentication token public certificate. This certificate is also used to encrypt the data. 1.1 Registration Via Aadhaar 1.1.1 v1/registration/aadhaar/generateOtp Generate Aadhaar OTP on Registered mobile number 1.1.2 v1/registration/aadhaar/verifyOTP Verify Aadhaar OTP received on Registered mobile number 1.1.3 v1/registration/aadhaar/generateMobileOTP Generate Mobile OTP for verification. 1.1.4 v1/registration/aadhaar/verifyMobileOTP Verify Mobile OTP in an existing transaction.
